short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the 'list' URL parameter from YouTube links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension for Chrome/Chromium allows you to open YouTube videos from a playlist without a playlist context!

How it works?
list attribute in video url will be removed so any playlist video will be played normally (without playlist context)
